fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Bounce (2 uses): Choose a player each night to bounce their abilities onto another random player. The target player's abilities will be redirected and affect the new target instead. This ability cannot target the same player twice in a row.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- During Tuesday and Friday, Pong gains an additional use of Bounce.
- Pong is immune to role-blocking.
